      private boolean playerAttacks()

      private void playerDefends()
      Is called when the Player is in a battle and chooses defend himself Calculation: tempDefBoost = (armorDef / 2) If (armorDef > 10) then = 2 If (calcDef < 1) then = 1 NOT OPTIMAL!r

      Is called when the Player is in a battle and tries to flee from the fight

      (package private) void startBattle​(Actor enemy)
      This method gets called when the player enters a room or place that contains an enemy Monster Damage Calculation: MonsterDamage + RndNr (1-2) - PlayerArmorPoints

        set the player for this instance of BattleController
        Parameters:

      • startBattle

        void startBattle​(Actor enemy)
        This method gets called when the player enters a room or place that contains an enemy Monster Damage Calculation: MonsterDamage + RndNr (1-2) - PlayerArmorPoints

      • playerAttacks

        private boolean playerAttacks()
        Is called when the Player is in a battle and chooses to attack the enemy Player Damage Calculation: (WeaponDamage) + (RndNr from 1 to WeaponDamage+2) If maximum damage was reached, it counts as critical hit

      • enemyAttacks

        boolean enemyAttacks​(boolean monsterAlive)
        lets the enemy attack the player if he is alive, calculating the damage done
        Parameters:
        monsterAlive - true if the enemy is still alive
        Returns:
        true if monster is already dead, false if monster still alive

      • rewardPlayerForMerchantKill

        private void rewardPlayerForMerchantKill()
        Rewards Player for killing a Merchant by increasing his exp, giving him gold and checking for level up

      • rewardPlayerForMonsterKill

        void rewardPlayerForMonsterKill()
        Rewards Player for killing a Monster by increasing his exp, giving him gold and checking for level up

      • calculateExperienceReward

        private int calculateExperienceReward()
        calculate the exp the player gets rewarded
        Returns:
        exp amount to give player

      • checkWeaponDurability

        void checkWeaponDurability()
        Check whether the Player's Weapons Durability is <= 0 . if yes, it breaks and gets deleted from his inventory.

      • isPlayerAlive

        private void isPlayerAlive()
        checks if the Player is alive every time he got hit by an enemy

      • playerDefends

        private void playerDefends()
        Is called when the Player is in a battle and chooses defend himself Calculation: tempDefBoost = (armorDef / 2) If (armorDef > 10) then = 2 If (calcDef < 1) then = 1 NOT OPTIMAL!r

      • playerFlees

        private void playerFlees()
        Is called when the Player is in a battle and tries to flee from the fight
